description: A new study shows dark matter falls into cosmic gravity wells much like ordinary matter, narrowing one of astronomy’s biggest mysteries. Researchers say any unknown force acting on dark matter must be very weak, though future missions could detect smaller effects. The findings bring scientists closer to understanding how the universe’s unseen mass behaves.
title: Dark Matter May Behave Like Ordinary Matter Under Gravity, New Study Finds

description: The interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS has brightened far faster than expected during its solar approach, surprising researchers. Scientists say the unusual surge may point to rare chemical traits from another star system. Further observations in 2025 may reveal why this cosmic visitor behaves differently from typical comets in our solar neighbourhood.
title: Interstellar Visitor 3I/ATLAS Brightens Faster Than Expected, Surprising Scientists

description: Using ALMA, Keio University scientists measured a 5.13 K cosmic background temperature from 7 billion years ago—matching Big Bang predictions of universal cooling. This precise reading, based on quasar absorption data, is the most accurate at that epoch and offers strong confirmation of how the Universe’s temperature decreases over time.
title: Keio University Team Measures Ancient Cosmic Temperature, Confirming Big Bang Prediction

description: A South Australian man’s car windshield was struck and melted by a mysterious object, prompting an investigation by the South Australian Museum. If confirmed as a meteorite, it would be the first known instance of one hitting a moving vehicle. Experts say only lab analyses can determine whether it was a rock or space debris.
title: Meteorite May Have Hit Moving Car in Australia, Scientists Investigate

description: Thousands of unexplained sky flashes captured in 1950s Palomar Observatory photos are being reanalysed. Scientists suspect they may have resulted from sunlight reflecting off early satellites or atmospheric changes after nuclear tests, which increased flash rates by up to 68%. Still, photographic artifacts remain a possible explanation.
title: Mysterious 1950s Sky Flashes Re-Examined in New Astronomical Study

description: NASA will retire the ISS in 2030, sending it to Point Nemo, a remote Pacific zone known as the spacecraft cemetery. Most of the station will burn up during reentry, with remaining debris falling harmlessly into the sea. The controlled descent aims to avoid past mishaps and reflects a new era of commercial space stations.
title: Point Nemo: The Remote Ocean Graveyard Where the ISS Will Make Its Final Descent in 2030

description: Jared K. Lepora, a 16-year-old student, built a robotic hand from LEGO MINDSTORMS that performs lifelike grasping using only two motors. Featuring a differential gearbox for adaptive motion, his design highlights how creativity and accessible materials can make advanced robotics education affordable worldwide.
title: 16-Year-Old Student Creates Lifelike Robotic Hand Using LEGO Parts

description: Directed by Srimanta Sengupta, along with others, starring Paoli Dam, in the new Bengali crime thriller based on true events and the life of the five gangsters of the time, retelling their story in a fictional manner, is now streaming on ZEE5.
title: Ganoshotru Now Available for Streaming on ZEE5: What You Need to Know About This Bangla Crime Thriller

description: Lee Jung-jae, the Squid Game fame driven in the new romantic comedy genre Nice To Not Meet You, is now on Prime Video, with S1 E1 out.
title: Lee Jung-jae Starrer New Romantic K-Drama Nice To Not Meet You Now on Prime Video

description: Maxton Hall Season 2 is set to arrive on Amazon Prime Video on Nov 7th, 2025, where it will pick up right after James’s Mother’s death.
title: Maxton Hall Season 2 OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Teja Sajja’s Mirai delivers a visually striking mythological superhero drama. With a strong supporting cast, immersive music, and breathtaking visuals, it has become one of 2025’s most talked-about Indian films. Hindi OTT release starts on Jio Hotstar from November 7, 2025.
title: Mirai Hindi OTT Release Date: When and Where to Teja Sajja’s Superhero Drama Online in Hindi?

description: A recent study by researchers from Heriot-Watt University has confirmed the presence of a massive crater beneath the Atlantic. The evidence supports the findings and the impact that was caused by a 66-million-year-old asteroid.
title: Scientists Discover Ancient Asteroid Crater Hidden Beneath the Atlantic Ocean

description: Vijay Antony leads Shakthi Thirumagan, a high-stakes political action thriller available on Jio Hotstar. Praised for its intense action sequences and gripping storyline, the film is a must-watch for fans of political dramas and action cinema, holding a 6.0 IMDb rating.
title: Shakthi Thirumagan Now Streaming on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know About Vijay Antony’s Political Action Thriller

description: Dispatch has sold one million copies in 10 days since it launched, developer AdHoc Studio announced Tuesday. The episodic superhero adventure game is available on PC and PS5, with four episodes out right now.
title: Dispatch, Episodic Superhero Game Starring Breaking Bad's Aaron Paul, Sells 1 Million Copies in 10 Days

description: Nothing has confirmed that Phone 3a Lite users will soon be able to completely uninstall Meta services, following backlash over pre-installed apps like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok. The feature will roll out later this month with the Nothing OS 4.0 beta update. The company defended its move, claiming preloaded apps boost performance and cut costs, but users argue it undermines Nothing’s clean-software promise. The new Lock Glimpse feature has also drawn criticism for being intrusive, though it can be disabled in settings.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite Owners Can Uninstall Meta Services After Company Faces Backlash Over Preloaded Apps

description: The best gaming phones under Rs. 40,000 in India include the Oppo F31 Pro+, Oppo K13 Turbo Pro, OnePlus 13R, Vivo V60, Realme GT 7, and iQOO Neo 10. These smartphones feature high-refresh-rate AMOLED displays, high-performing Snapdragon or Dimensity chipsets, advanced cooling systems, large batteries with fast charging, and up to 16GB RAM with 512GB storage. Each model offers powerful performance, reliable thermal control, and sleek designs, making them ideal for gaming enthusiasts seeking flagship-level power at a mid-range price.
title: Best Gaming Phones Under Rs 40,000: Oppo K13 Turbo Pro, Realme GT 7, iQOO Neo 10, and More

description: Infinix’s latest GT 30 Pro comes with both the ‘GT’ and ‘Pro’ branding, and with these it sure has some big shoes to fill. Last year’s GT was a capable gaming-oriented smartphone, but apart from the external cooler, it did not offer anything more for gaming audiences that it was looking to attract. This year, there’s a new processor, a mature design and some added gaming hardware that might just do the trick.
title: Infinix GT 30 Pro: A Capable Mid-Range Gaming Device?

description: Lovable has partnered with cybersecurity firm Guardio to add automated protection against malicious websites built on its AI coding platform. Guardio’s Safe Browsing Engine will scan every generated site for phishing, scams or impersonation and block suspicious projects before they go live. The move follows earlier research showing the platform could be misused for harmful content, as Lovable adds stronger guardrails for safe AI-driven development.
title: Lovable Partners With Guardio to Detect and Block Malicious Websites Created via Vibe Coding

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series' launch date recently surfaced online, suggesting that the lineup might launch later than earlier anticipated. Expected to include the vanilla Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, and Galaxy S26 Ultra, the handsets are said to be powered by an Exynos 2600 chip in select markets and by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC in others. Now, a report reveals that the Galaxy S26 series could launch at a higher price than its predecessor, the Galaxy S25 lineup, due to the rising cost of critical components.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Price Hike Likely Due to Rising Price of Key Components: Report

description: DeFi platform Stream Finance has paused operations following a $93 million (roughly Rs. 825 crore) loss caused by an external fund manager. The company has hired Perkins Coie LLP to investigate the incident and plans to recover liquid assets. The halt highlights growing risks and transparency concerns across decentralised finance ecosystems.
title: Stream Finance Discloses $93 Million Loss After Probe, Halts Operations

description: The Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) has launched Fintech 2030, a five-year roadmap built on the success of Fintech 2025. Centred on Data, Artificial Intelligence, Resilience and Tokenisation (DART), it introduces 40 initiatives, including tokenised bonds, e-HKD trials and quantum-safe infrastructure to strengthen Hong Kong’s global fintech leadership.
title: Hong Kong Unveils Fintech 2030 Strategy to Accelerate AI, RWA Tokenisation

description: The Asus ROG Xbox Ally X has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop features a 16-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display that offers decent colour reproduction. It also features a dependable Qualcomm Snapdragon X processor that can handle most of the daily tasks with ease. Check out the review to learn more about the latest Asus laptop.
title: Asus ROG Xbox Ally X Review: The New Handheld King?

description: The OnePlus Ace 6 Pro Max is expected to debut soon as a more powerful variant of the Ace 6, launched in October. An image of the phone's retail box has surfaced online. Leaks suggest it may feature the new Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, a 6.7-inch 1.5K OLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate, and an 8,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging.  It may arrive in India as the OnePlus 15R.
title: OnePlus Ace 6 Pro Max Retail Box Leak Hints at Imminent Launch, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC

description: OpenAI has been urged by Japan’s Content Overseas Distribution Association (CODA) to stop training its AI models on copyrighted anime and gaming content. CODA, representing major publishers behind Dragon Ball, Naruto, One Piece, Final Fantasy and Studio Ghibli classics, said Sora 2 outputs closely resemble protected works, potentially indicating misuse of training data. The group demanded OpenAI halt such training and formally respond to rights-holders’ infringement concerns.
title: OpenAI Faces Backlash from Studio Ghibli, Bandai Namco Over AI-Generated Anime Videos

description: Starring Nawazuddin Siddiqui in the lead role, Raat Akeli Hai returns for another part on Netflix. This time, the stakes will be higher, as Inspector Jatil Yadav will investigate a complex, chilling case of murder.
title: Raat Akeli Hai: The Bansal Murders to Release on OTT Soon: Everything You Need to Know

description: Apple has released the iOS 26.1 update, introducing a new toggle to adjust or disable the Liquid Glass effect, which drew criticism for its excessive translucency and poor readability. Users can now choose between “Clear” and “Tinted” options under Settings and Display & Brightness, with the latter offering a more opaque look. This update marks a rare instance of Apple responding directly to user feedback, scaling back one of its most divisive design choices in recent iOS history.
title: How to Disable the Liquid Glass Effect After Installing the iOS 26.1 Update: A Step-By-Step Guide

description: Lava Agni 4 will feature an Aluminium body, instead of the plastic body seen on its predecessor, Agni 3 5G, according to a teaser shared by the company on a social media platform. The handset is scheduled to debut in India on November 20. While most of the specifications, features, pricing, and colour options are still under wraps, the Noida-based tech firm has shown its upcoming Agni series phone with a dual rear camera unit and a new button on the right side, which resembles Apple's Camera Control button.
title: Lava Agni 4 Confirmed to Feature Aluminium Frame, Design Teased Ahead of India Launch

description: Nintendo Switch 2 has surpassed 10 million units sold, Nintendo confirmed during its latest financial results. The console has sold 10.36 million units as of September 30. Software sales on the Switch crossed 20 million units. Nintendo also increased its full-year Switch 2 sales forecast.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Crosses 10 Million Units Sold, Nintendo Hikes Full-Year Sales Forecast

description: Vivo X300 Ultra's key specifications have surfaced online, suggesting that the rumoured handset might offer an upgraded rear camera setup than its predecessor, the Vivo X200 Ultra. Recently, a tipster revealed that the Vivo X300 Ultra will carry a triple rear camera unit, headlined by two 200-megapixel cameras. The handset will be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, instead of the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip powering the Vivo X200 Ultra. Moreover, it could feature a similar 2K resolution display as its supposed predecessor.
title: Vivo X300 Ultra Tipped to Launch With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chip, 200-Megapixel Cameras

description: WhatsApp has been working on support for usernames for a while, and a feature tracker has spotted signs of support for username-based calling, suggesting future updates may include this functionality. Unlike Signal, which already offers similar features, WhatsApp might introduce a unique element called a “username key,” which could offer better privacy and keep spammers at bay.
title: WhatsApp Might Soon Let You Call Other Users By Typing Their Username

description: Bitcoin dropped below $105,000 (roughly Rs. 92.9 lakh) on Tuesday as $1.1 billion (roughly Rs. 9,740 crore) worth of crypto positions were liquidated amid a global liquidity squeeze. Ethereum fell to $3,500 (roughly Rs. 3.12 lakh), while altcoins like Solana, BNB, and Dogecoin saw steep declines. Analysts suggest the volatility marks a correction phase rather than panic, with long-term investors eyeing accumulation opportunities.
title: Crypto Market Consolidation Sees Bitcoin Price Drop Under $105,000 as Market Liquidations Cross $1.1 Billion

description: Grab says it built its own lightweight vision model after finding both proprietary and open-source AI systems struggled with Southeast Asian languages, leading to errors and high latency in document processing. The move underscores a broader concern: frontier models from firms like Google, OpenAI and Anthropic still lack robust multilingual support, especially for low-resource or minority languages, limiting real-world accessibility and reliability.
title: Grab Superapp Says AI Models Struggle to Understand Asian Languages

description: Moto G67 Power 5G is set to launch in India on November 3. While various features of the upcoming phone were known, the handset has now been listed on the Motorola India website, revealing its storage variants, colourways, and key specifications in full, a day before its unveiling. It will be available in the country via Flipkart and the company's online store in three colourways. The phone will be offered in 8GB RAM + 128GB storage and 8GB RAM + 256GB storage configurations. It will be powered by a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chip, paired with a 7,000mAh battery.
title: Moto G67 Power 5G Specifications, Storage Variants Revealed Before Launch in India

description: Vivo has confirmed that the Y500 Pro will launch in China on November 10 at 7pm local time (4:30pm IST). The handset will feature a 6.67-inch 1.5K OLED display, a 200-megapixel Samsung HP5 camera with OIS, and a 7,000mAh battery supporting 90W fast charging. It will also offer IP68 and IP69 dust and water resistance ratings and an anti-glare glass back. A Geekbench listing suggests the smartphone uses a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset with 12GB RAM and runs Android 16 with OriginOS 6.
title: Vivo Y500 Pro Launch Date, Key Features Announced; Listed on Geekbench With Dimensity 7400 SoC

description: Apple's iOS 26.1 update is now available for users to download and install. The new firmware upgrade brings a much-anticipated option for users, which will allow them to switch between the default clear Liquid Glass look and a new tinted look. It also introduces Communication Safety and Web content filters for children aged between 13 and 17 to limit them from viewing adult websites. The company has also fixed various known issues with previous versions of iOS 26, like AirDrop icon visual defects in the iOS share sheet.
title: Apple Releases iOS 26.1 Update With New Liquid Glass Setting, Several Security Fixes

description: MSI Claw handhelds are getting the Xbox full screen experience from ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X handhelds. Microsoft confirmed the interface was rolling out to MSI handhelds as part of Windows 11 Insider Preview Build. The interface will be made available on more devices in the coming months.
title: Microsoft is Rolling Out ROG Xbox Ally's Xbox Full Screen Experience on MSI Claw Handhelds

description: The Oppo Reno 15 model has appeared on Geekbench, suggesting a MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chipset with a Mali-G720 MC7 GPU. The octa-core processor includes four cores at 2.10GHz, three at 3.00GHz, and one at 3.25GHz. The handset scored 1,668 and 6,274 points in single-core and multi-core tests, respectively. It is expected to run Android 16 with 16GB of RAM. The Reno 15 series, including Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro, and Reno 15 Mini, is rumoured to launch in India in December.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Listed on Geekbench With Dimensity 8450 SoC, Could Launch Soon

description: Samsung’s Galaxy S26 Ultra could take another step toward a softer design. New leaks shared by tipster IceUniverse suggest the upcoming flagship may feature noticeably rounder edges, continuing the shift that began with the Galaxy S25 Ultra. The images, reportedly of tempered glass screen protectors, also indicate Samsung will retain flat displays across the Galaxy S26 lineup. The series is rumoured to launch around February 25, though the company has yet to confirm the date.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Said to Get a Major Design Upgrade, to Be More Ergonomic

description: OpenAI has entered a seven-year agreement with Amazon worth $38 billion to purchase cloud services, after last week's restructuring that granted it more autonomy. The deal provides OpenAI access to hundreds of thousands of Nvidia GPUs, essential for training and operating its AI models, including ChatGPT, as it accelerates its artificial intelligence development efforts.
title: OpenAI Turns to Amazon in $38 Billion Cloud Services Deal After Restructuring

description: ChatGPT Go is now available for free in India for the next 12 months, a promotion tied to OpenAI’s DevDay Exchange event in the country. The plan, normally priced at Rs. 399 per month, sits between the free tier and ChatGPT Plus, offering extended access to GPT-5 and higher usage limits for messages, uploads, and image generation. Users can activate it easily by upgrading to the Go plan through ChatGPT on the web.
title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Go Plan Is Now Available for Free: Know How to Get It
